CEQUEL

26 September, 2011

CEQUEL is a randomised clinical trial of treatment for bipolar depression. The trial is comparing combination therapy with quetiapine plus lamotrigine with quetiapine monotherapy for treatment of bipolar depression. This is a fairly straightforward site created by Minervation for the Oxford Clinical Trials Unit for Mental Illness, providing information about the CEQUEL trial.

Launch date: 9th May 2008
